openblocks.yacodeblocks
Class BlockRules

java.lang.Object
  openblocks.yacodeblocks.BlockRules

public class BlockRules
extends Object

BlockRules specifies rules and methods for Block linking in the Young Android language. The algorithm for rule checking proceeds as such: In the ya_lang_def.xml file, a block's sockets and plugs can be tagged with one or more types. When checking to see if two blocks can be connected, the socket block's socket types and plug block's plug types are checked for a match. (If either the plug or socket has no associated types, the connection is allowed). If this check fails, the plug block is then checked for possible coercion. The type coercion map is checked to see if the plug's type can coerce to any of the socket blocks types. (If either the plug or socket has no associated types, the coercion is prevented).

initializeRules

protected static void initializeRules()
Create linking and coercion rules for all block genusus

createBlockRules

public static void createBlockRules(String genusName)
Create block connection rules for a block's plugs and sockets. One can either include individual primitives for plugs and sockets, or exclude individual primitives for plugs and sockets (in which case all primitive types except those mentioned will be permissible).

Parameters:
genusName - The genus for which to make rules

createPropertyRules

protected static void createPropertyRules(String componentGenus,
                                          String propName,
                                          String type)
Create block connection rules for a component property.

Parameters:
componentGenus - The genus name of the component
propName - The name of the component property
type - The Codeblocks type of the component's property

canLink

protected static boolean canLink(Block socketBlock,
                                 Block plugBlock,
                                 String socketLabel)
Determine if two genuses can be connected according to the YA rules.

Parameters:
socketBlock - the socket block in this block connection
plugBlock - the plug block in this block connection
socketLabel - the label on the socket

canCoerce

protected static CoercionResult canCoerce(Block socketBlock,
                                          Block plugBlock,
                                          String socketLabel)
Determine if two blocks can be connected through type coercion.

Parameters:
socketBlock - the block containing the socket in this block connection
socketLabel - the label on the socket
Returns:
the result of the coercion
